attributes.action: establish an independent body which will receive funding for the National Health Service and within overall government policy will distribute NHS funding provision to NHS providers (not private providers) according to patient need, and facilitate the local management of the NHS according to local need.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst we must have a National Health Service that guaruntees all health care is free at the point of delivery (including ALL non-elective dental care) for all citizens of the UK, the constant ineterference of national government in the day-to-day management and medium and long-term planning of service delivery has led to gross waste and ineffective managment and administration.
